title: Citizen CZ Smart PQ2 Hybrid Smartwatch with YouQ Wellness app Featuring IBM Watson® AI and NASA Research, Black and White Customizable Display, Bluetooth, HR, Activity Tracker, 18-Day Battery Life
description: Introducing the second-generation CZ Smart Hybrid, the smarter smartwatch with *18-day battery life. The Citizen CZ Smart Hybrid smartwatch with 44mm grey IP case and bracelet with red accents marries the iconic design you expect from Citizen with innovative science and technology in the proprietary new app, YouQ. CZ Smart YouQ leverages AI Models built with IBM Watson® Studio and research from NASA to help you improve alertness and promote the building of better habits. *Battery life varies based on usage.
